nodes.text: A clone was stationed in the Republic Judiciary Central Detention Center in the Galactic City on Coruscant.

Around 21 BBY, when Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi disguised himself as bounty hunter Rako Hardeen and infiltrated the Republic Judiciary Central Detention Center to uncover a plot to assassinate Supreme Chancellor Palpatine, this clone was working in the detention facility's morgue.

After the undercover Jedi along with prisoners Cad Bane and Moralo Eval started a prison riot in the mess hall, they managed to evade the prison guards and attempted to use the morgue to escape, hiding inside coffins that would later be sent to the cremation center. This clone along with two others were working in the morgue when the incident happened, involuntarily helping the prisoners escape the facility by sending the coffins to be cremated.

The clone first appeared in the fifteenth episode of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series' fourth season, titled "Deception". He was voiced by Dee Bradley Baker, the actor who portrays all of the clone troopers in the series.
